Belthassan smiled: Good! Now, follow me. I will introduce you to the 
other Tripredacus.

He sends a mental signal to Daemos, telling him about what probably 
happened to Firedrill and what Anachronox has done as of yet.

Daemos: I see... (He sighs heavily) Prophecy, open a frequency with 
the Autobot base... (opens up) Pacifix, we have found out what was 
going on in our Renewal Chambers. The news I am about to deliver are 
not very encourageing...


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Anachronox --
> 
> Anachronox shrugs, "I see no reason why not." As he agrees to join 
> the Tripredacus, the new techno-organic comes to a conclusion; 
> Belthassan either had a part in his creation, or was his creator, 
and 
> thus should be protected. "Anachronox will join the Belthassan and 
> the Tripredacus."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Belthassan: Take it easy, friend. You are a new being in this 
> > universe, it is normal. If you want, you can become one of us, a 
> > Tripredacus. How do you feel? What do you think about this?
